channel.title: DClaws Soo close to fixing
channel.description:
Hey
they came Existed but when i attack they still hit with there fist :( how i make them so the actully hit??
PM back really wont them workin!

if(playerEquiptment[playerWeapon] == 4747

item.title: DClaws Soo close to fixing
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068); getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; }
’

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); usingSpecial = true; }

try useing those >.>

Read full topic

item.title: DClaws Soo close to fixing
item.dc:creator: @Ub3r_Gh0st Ub3r Gh0st
item.description:
@Ub3r_Gh0st wrote:

Ok so what you got to do is go into your server files and find client.java
Then Ctrl+F And Search For if(playerEquiptment[playerWeapon] == 4747
Go Underneath The Torag hammers and put

        }
        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664) // torags hammers
        {
            return 2068;

If Done Correctly it should look a bit like this

        }
        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726) // guthans spear
        {
            return 2080;
        }
        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4747) // torags hammers
        {
            return 2068;
        }
        if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664) // torags hammers
        {
            return 2068;

now save and compile, you should now have d claws attacking like Torags hammers, but no spec, can’t help you with spec though, im stuck with that too.

Read full topic

}

item.title: DClaws Soo close to fixing
item.dc:creator: @RarerThanRares RarerThanRares
item.description:
@RarerThanRares wrote:

Ill show you how i did it…

open client.java and search for:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4747

add next to that:

 || playerEquipment [playerWeapon] == 13664)

it should look like this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4747 || playerEquipment [playerWeapon] == 13664) // torags hammers { return 2068; }

This should make it hit like the torags hammers

Read full topic

for the swing you add it into client.java under [code] public int GetWepAnim() {[/code] then put [code] if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ITEM ID) { return 451; }[/code] that should do it i got it to not dis-appear
